titleStmt.title: The King, and none under God, but the King, can save this nation. With a Welch prophesie (prophecied above a thousand years ago) now Englished and fulfilled to the admiration of all that reads it. / By William Williams, gent.
titleStmt.author: Williams, William, b. 1613.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cardiff Central Library.
